subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Stewart’s return at Atlanta Motor Speedway will end a three-race hiatus after his car struck and killed the driver Kevin Ward Jr. during a dirt-track race.
snippet: Stewart’s return at Atlanta Motor Speedway will end a three-race hiatus after his car struck and killed the driver Kevin Ward Jr. during a dirt-track race.
